thread.title: Carrie and Bernie
thread.title_full: Rover.com reviewed by Carrie and Bernie

author: Carrie and Bernie
title: Carrie and Bernie
text:
We travel often and can not always take our dear lab Susanna. I recently heard of Rover.com and found a very responsible and loving sitter near our neighborhood. It was easy to arrange and Susanna had a great time.
The web site is well organized and the biographies of the pet care givers give you a feel for their personalities and qualifications. The guest ratings sold me....they show reviews with a written note plus repeat customer numbers. I wish I could screen/filter for sitters who only take one pet at a time or would be with our dog throughout the day. You can determine this information but it takes a bit of time to read through each sitters page.
I give Rover 4 stars and will definitely use again. My only criticism is the filtering/ screen capability of their website.
